content: same way as the rightcross before the handle leftcross 6b rightcross twice leftcross 3b twice join b © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 21 round 46 ch2 2b rightcross 2b leftcross 4b rightcross in case of crocheting the handle instead of last rightcross skip 2f 2nd f around 1st st of the handle 1btr around post of skipped st if you decide to crochet ch25 now we count the btr as the first chain if you are crocheting double_crochet or f on handles already crochet btr and f decrease instead of this btr and the first f on the handle 2b leftcross 4b rightcross twice 2b if you are crocheting the handle already make the next leftcross symmetrical in the same way as the rightcross before the handle leftcross 4b rightcross 2b twice leftcross 2b twice join b round 47 ch2 1b around post of 1st st 6b leftcross rightcross 1b 5b leftcross rightcross 6b leftcross rightcross 5b 1b leftcross rightcross 6b 3 times leftcross rightcross 1b 5b leftcross rightcross 6b leftcross
